Damaged.Recommendation: Consult a dermatologist or trichologist. Begin a restorative routine with protein and moisture balance.
Damaged.Why: Hair damage may result from heat styling, chemical treatments, or environmental exposure. Professional guidance prevents worsening.

Dry.Recommendation: Increase hydration with moisturizing masks and leave-in conditioners. Consult a professional if dryness persists.
Dry.Why: Dry hair often indicates lack of moisture or scalp imbalance, which may require medical evaluation if chronic.

Moisturized.Recommendation: Maintain your current routine with balanced hydration and protective styling.
Moisturized.Why: Proper moisture retention supports hair elasticity, reduces breakage, and promotes healthy growth.

Healthy.Why: Healthy hair indicates good scalp and cuticle condition, but preventive care ensures long-term health.
